      • registerHandler

        public void registerHandler(CotDetailHandler handler)
        Register a detail handler for the given detail element name. Registration of a handler object more than once is disallowed.
        Parameters:
        handler - CoT detail handler

      • unregisterHandler

        public void unregisterHandler(CotDetailHandler handler)
        Unregister a detail handler
        Parameters:
        handler - CoT detail handler

      • registerHandler

        public void registerHandler(java.lang.String detailName,
                            MarkerDetailHandler handler)
        Register a marker-specific detail handler This is here for legacy compatibility - detail handlers should extend CotDetailHandler instead
        Parameters:
        detailName - Detail name used to lookup the handler
        handler - Marker handler

      • unregisterHandler

        public void unregisterHandler(MarkerDetailHandler handler)
        Unregister a marker-specific detail handler This is here for legacy compatibility - detail handlers should extend CotDetailHandler instead
        Parameters:
        handler - Marker handler

      • addDetails

        public boolean addDetails(MapItem item,
                          CotEvent event)
        Create and add CoT details to a given event
        Parameters:
        item - The item to read from
        event - The CoT event to add to
        Returns:
        True if one or more details were added, false if not

      • processDetails

        public CommsMapComponent.ImportResult processDetails(MapItem item,
                                                     CotEvent event)
        Given a map item and a cot event, process the cot event details into the appropriate tags within the map item
        Parameters:
        item - the map item to fill
        event - the cot event to use
        Returns:
        the map item correctly reflects the values provided by the cot event.
